citations.narrative:
The facility has adequate space and opportunities for each dog to socialize, however the written exercise program has not
been approved by the new attending veterinarian (AV). An exercise program that is reviewed and approved by the AV
helps ensure that dogs have enough space and socialization. Ensure that the written exercise program is reviewed and
approved by the attending veterinarian.
***Correct by June 5, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.8 
   
Exercise for dogs. 
The facility has adequate space and opportunities for each dog to socialize, however the written exercise program has not 
been approved by the new attending veterinarian (AV). An exercise program that is reviewed and approved by the AV 
helps ensure that dogs have enough space and socialization. Ensure that the written exercise program is reviewed and 
approved by the attending veterinarian.  
***Correct by June 5, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
